analysis.key_quote: The proposed rule undermines more than 140 years of civil service reform following the spoils system. It opens the door to politically motivated firings and tramples on employees’ constitutional and statutory rights.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of civil service protections, politicization of the workforce, and the undermining of employee rights, which aligns with the indicators of opposition.
